page.title: 13SPORTSDAY IN EDDERTON
page.content: Every year in August the local headmaster holds{the village sports for the young people of Edderton. They start at 2.00 p.m.There are a variety of races e.g.{the flat race,sack race, {camel,wheelbarrow,piggy back,crab, the {three legged race and many more.}At about 3.30 we have an interval for {soft drinks,tea,sandwiches,home made {cakes and ice cream.}Then we start playing{team games, a Tug of War between the men and women and some {adults' races.}When they have finished all the races,prizes of money are given out to the winners.There is a {cup}for the best sports boy and a {shield}for the best sports girl.The winners get their names engraved on to it and keep it for one year.When the weather is fine it is a really enjoyable day as most of the villagers come to spectate or take part.
